title_narrative: Assessing National Food Control Systems to enable enhanced food safety in the sub-region
description_narrative:
To enable rational planning for the strengthening of national food control systems in the two focus countries based on a rigorous evidence-based assessment
To build understanding within the CARICOM member countries of the internationally recognized good practice in the design and management of national food control systems
To strengthen the role of the Caribbean Agricultural Health and Food Safety Agency
To act as a catalyst to achieve increased south-south cooperation among CARICOM member countries in relation to food control
To bolster regional food safety and consumer protection, thus impacting positively on food security
